name: ME Flash Descriptor Override
description: The Flash Descriptor Security Override Strap is not accessible to end users on consumer boards and Intel stresses that this is for debugging only.
failure-impact: The system firmware can be written from userspace by changing the protected region.
This gives any attacker with root access a method to write persistent executable code to the firmware, which survives even a full disk wipe and OS reinstall.

success-results.locked: device in in normal runtime mode
